data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Littoral, Benin by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Littoral, Benin
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Littoral.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.section_summary: On average, 17 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Littoral, Benin.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Littoral
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 166,430 people in the state of Littoral who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Songhai-Koyraboro people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, you desire the people in the state of Littoral who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Littoral.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Littoral, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

location.name: Littoral
location.people_groups_list: Aguna, Anii, Mandingo, Mandinka, Biali, Batonu, Baruba
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Aguna (19,000), Anii (46,000), Mandingo, Mandinka (12,000), Biali (162,000), Batonu, Baruba (928,000)
